set.name: DMD-26 Masters Chronicle Deck: Survivor Evo-Theory %CE%B1 to %CE%A9

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Survivor

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Blocker(Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's untapped creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. Survivor(Each of your Survivors have the above ability)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to it's owner's hand. Survivor(Each of your Survivors have the above ability)

property.name: Race
property.value: Giant Insect/Survivor

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may summon this creature from your mana zone. This creature gets +5000 power and 'double breaker'. Survivor(Each of your Survivors have the above ability)

property.name: Race
property.value: Mecha Del Sol

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a race other than Mecha Del Sol. Each creature of that race gets +4000 power. Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can't choose this one.(It can still be attacked and blocked)

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their deck. Then each player draws 5 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ultra Saver: Survivor(When one of your Survivors would leave the battle zone, you may destroy this creature instead) Survivor(Each of your Survivors have the above ability)

property.name: Race
property.value: Sea Hacker/Survivor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may draw a card. Survivor(Each of your Survivors have the above ability)

property.name: Race
property.value: Tree Folk/Survivor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Survivor(Each of your Survivors have the above ability)

property.name: Race
property.value: Balloon Mushroom/Survivor

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost)

property.name: Race
property.value: Starlight Tree/Cyber Lord/Survivor

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped)

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) ​ Shield trigger(When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost) Choose one of the following.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped. Then return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Race
property.value: Outrage MAX

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost) When you put this creature into the battle zone, skip the rest of the turn.(Immediately start the next player's turn)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost) Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If a fire or nature card was revealed in this way, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Race
property.value: Survivor/Colony Beetle

property.name: Rules
property.value: Survivor(Each of your Survivors has this creature's ability)

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Choose one of the following.
►Put the top 3 cards of your deck into your mana zone. ►Choose one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone.
Double Evolution Burst(If you have an evolution creature in the battle zone, you may choose both)

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost) Evolution - Put on one of your Survivors. Each of your creatures in the battle zone is a Survivor in addition to its other races.
